amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the International Forestry Program by $7.4 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 85 in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the Department of Agriculture, Forest Service, State and Private Forestry and increases the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 256 (Roll no. 67).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 256 (Roll no. 67).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Pompeo.
